amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the October 15, 2003 election in Azerbaijan and require a report on an investigation in Azerbaijan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1973 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1973 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S13366; text: CR S13366) To express the sense of Congress on the October 15, 2003 election in Azerbaijan and require a report on an investigation in Azerbaijan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1973 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1973 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain.
